inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: increase in baseline creatinine of 0.5mg/dL to a value of >2.0 mg/dL within 3 days

inclusion.criterion: Absence of improvement in renal function after adequate fluid resuscitation
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of sensitivity/allergy to lactulose or rifaximin or rifampin
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine.
